settings.markdownTextFunction:
if (data.length) { const entity = data[0]; const desctiption = entity.entityDescription ? `

Desctiption

${entity.entityDescription}

` : ''; const entityLabel = entity.entityLabel !== entity.entityName ? `

Label

${entity.entityLabel}

` : ''; const lastMaintenanceDate = entity.lastMaintenanceDate ? `

Last maintenance

${new Date(entity.lastMaintenanceDate).toLocaleString("en-GB", {year: "numeric", month: "short", day: "numeric"})}

` : ''; // const nextMaintenanceIn = ((new Date(entity.lastMaintenanceDate + 1000 * 60 * 60 * 2600).getTime() - Date.now()) / 1000 / 60 / 60).toFixed(); const nextMaintenanceIn = 2600 - entity.totalWorkingHours; return `

Name

${entity.entityName}

` + entityLabel + `

Status

${entity.running}

Operating hours (current session)

${entity.currentSessionDuration} h

Operating hours (summary)

${entity.totalWorkingHours} h

`+ lastMaintenanceDate + `

Next maintenance in

${nextMaintenanceIn} h

`+ desctiption +`
`; }

headerButton.name: Edit
headerButton.customHtml:
Edit {{entityName}}
Label
Maintenance
